required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: TD01 Master Study (Safety and Efficacy Study)
clinical_study.official_title: TD01 Master Study (Safety and Efficacy Study)

brief_summary.textblock: This clinical investigation is designed to confirm the safety and efficacy of the TD01 ICD lead.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.description: Non-inferiority of the pacing threshold compared to Linox TD
Non-inferiority of the sensing amplitude compared to Linox TD

intervention.intervention_name: First ICD/CRT-D implantation or upgrade from pacemaker
intervention.other_name: Lumax 540, 640 or 740: VR-T, DR-T or HF-T or
Ilesto 5 or Ilesto 7 DF-1: VR-T, DR-T or HF-T or
Iforia 3, 5 or Iforia 7 DF-1: VR-T, DR-T or HF-T
Free choice of additional RA and/or LV lead (if applicable)

study_pop.textblock: The patients selected for the investigation should be from the investigator's general patient population according to the inclusion and exclusion criteria.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Meet standard indication for ICD/CRT-D therapy
- First ICD/CRT-D implantation or upgrade from pacemaker
- Duly signed informed consent form
- Willing to participate for the whole study duration
- Patient accepts Home Monitoring concept and is able to activate and use the CardioMessenger
- Patient has a legal capacity and ability to consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Meet a standard contraindication for an ICD/CRT-D therapy
- Age < 18 years
- Pregnant or breast-feeding
- Cardiac surgery planned within the next six months
- Enrollment in another cardiac clinical investiga-tion with active treatment arm
- Mechanical tricuspid valve prosthesis or severe tricuspid valve disease
- Known dexamethasone acetate intolerance

overall_official.affiliation: Medizinische Klinik II, Klinikum Frankfurt (Oder) GmbH, Muellroser Chaussee 7, 15236 Frankfurt (Oder) Germany
